detailed_results.input: My mother Thetis tells me that there are two ways in which I [Achilles] may meet my end. If I stay here and fight, I shall not return alive but my name will live for ever:
detailed_results.reasoning: Gold states a conditional under Achilles' control: always, if he stays and fights then he dies and his name lives forever. Prediction instead is a disjunction of two global properties (G(fight && !alive)) OR (G live_forever), losing the implication structure, omitting the 'stay_here' condition, and not requiring both die and name-lives to follow from staying and fighting.
